properties.Title: Tomokanga (Portal)
properties.ArtistCompany: Ariki Creative and Pixel Productions Ltd
properties.Description: Tomokanga is created from LED panels that form the legs and arches welcoming visitors into Victoria Square. This digital artwork invites you to walk through it as you enter and exit the festival, and like entering a portal, pass from one state to another.

properties.Title: Tomokanga (Portal)
properties.ArtistCompany: Ariki Creative and Pixel Productions Ltd
properties.Description: Tomokanga is created from LED panels that form the legs and arches welcoming visitors into Victoria Square. This digital artwork invites you to walk through it as you enter and exit the festival, and like entering a portal, pass from one state to another.

properties.Title: Ururangi Pou
properties.ArtistCompany: Ariki Creative and Pixel Productions Ltd
properties.Description:
One of the stars in the Matariki cluster, Ururangi (Merope), meaning winds of the sky, is the star linked to atmospheric conditions, winds, and the sky.
For T?rama Mai light is projected onto this symbolic and significant pou by local artist and master carver Riki Manuel, telling us of the battle between T?whirim?tea and his brothers and the anger T?whirim?tea felt for the separation of his parents, Papat??nuku and Ranginui.

properties.Title: Purapura Whetū
properties.ArtistCompany: Ariki Creative and Pixel Productions Ltd
properties.Description:
Purapura Whet? acknowledges the abundance of whet? in our night sky. Taking patterns from Ng? Whet?, Ng? Manu and cross-stitching them together, the digital techniques used by Ariki Creative to animate the images, reference the way in which tukutuku are woven together.
Keep an eye out for other tukutuku references throughout Victoria Square � you might see more, here and there

properties.Title: Pāhekoheko (Kinect Interactive)
properties.Description: Stand in front of the screen � Move your arms around! See your energy in colour.

properties.Title: Ata Pūao (First Light)
properties.Description: Each Pou will be covered on 2 sides in a corner arrangement with LED panels.

properties.Title: Kā Ata Mariko (Trees Interactive)
properties.Description: Spectrum Lighting and Sound encourage you to look up and marvel at the trees offering a vibrant and magical viewpoint of this area, rich in old, large trees that make up our Garden City.

properties.Title: Muramura te Mahara (Kāi Tahu Origin Story)
properties.ArtistCompany: The Light Site with Ariki Creative
properties.Description:
Actors: Ana Te Uruti and Taane Flanagan
Script: Hori Te Ariki Mataki with support from Lynne Harata Te-Aika
Sound Mix (Multi-Media Team): Damian Rarere
Back by popular demand, this 21m-long illuminated tunnel runs alongside the Bowker Fountain in Victoria Square. Walk through the dazzling light display and immerse yourself in the K?i Tahu origin story, Te Waitatatanga Mai o Ng? Atua by K?i Tahu rakatira, Mataiaha Tiram?rehu.

properties.Title: Matariki
properties.ArtistCompany: Art Fetiche and M?ui Studios Aotearoa
properties.Description: Matariki appears as a hologram of a powerful m?m? looking over her 8 tamariki � P?hutukawa, Tupu?nuku, Tupu?rangi, Wait?, Wait?, Waipuna-?-rangi, Ururangi, Hiwa-i-te-rangi.

properties.Title: Kā Pakiwaitara (Mitre10 Storytelling Zone)
properties.Description:
Live readings of Matariki stories and M?ori legends will be performed around the Ng? K?rero Pakiwaitara (Matariki storytelling zone), throughout the weekends of the festival, from 6pm to 8pm.
Do you have a favourite Matariki story? Ka rawe! Share it with your friends and or family.

properties.Title: Te Arawhiti (Light Bridge)
properties.Description:
Te Arawhiti is a colourful illumination of the Victoria Square Bridge, which crosses ?t?karo in the middle of the square. 
Can you see any Tuna swimming beneath it? Tuna are kaitiaki, or guardians, of our streams, rivers and lakes, and are used as environmental indicators.

properties.Title: He Ua Tūrama (Light Rain)
properties.Description: Vertical rods hanging from one of the many large trees in Victoria Square encourage you to look up! Trees are a vital component of our world for many reasons. They cool the air, stabilise soils and provide food and habitats for birds, insects and wildlife. They also greatly contribute to cleaning our air by sucking up and storing carbon.

properties.Title: Te Atamira (Performance Zone)
properties.Description: Throughout the course of T?rama Mai, entertainment from across ?tautahi is here to enliven your evening on Friday, Saturday and Sunday � from kapa haka to fire poi, we think you will find something you like.

properties.Title: Ngao Matariki - Ka Tīaho, Ka Tūmanako
properties.ArtistCompany: Art Fetiche and Ariki Creative, Te Aotahi Rice Edwards, Eli Taueki and Hori Te Ariki Mataki with music by Kommi Tamati-Elliffe
properties.Description: In traditional M?ori carving a toki (adze) is used to carve through wood or stone. Ngao Matariki - Ka T?aho, Ka T?manako utilises light, instead of a toki, by cutting through the darkness of each cube revealing colourful and important tohu (symbols) of Puaka Matariki, like Te Kore � Te P?. Te Ao Marama, Te Kete M?tauraka and Mahika Kai.

properties.Title: Kā Pakiwaituhi
properties.Description: An animated reel using the characters already created by M?ui Studios, Matariki gives us some insight into the stars and their significance to K?i Tahu in this short animation.

properties.Title: Pōhutukawa
properties.Description: P?hutukawa (Sterope/Asterope) is the eldest child of Matariki. Her name is associated with the ancient P?hutukawa tree that sits on the edge of Te Rerenga Wairua and is where our wairua goes once it leaves our body and travels through Te Ara Wairua to P?hutukawa.

properties.Title: Tūrama Aroraki (Light the Building)
properties.Description: Light the building.

properties.Title: He Whetū Whārahi (A Starry Lightshow)
properties.Description: Light the building.

properties.Title: Te Awa Tūrama  (Radiant River)
properties.ArtistCompany: Season Event Design-ETS and music by Motte
properties.Description: Follow the mesmerising lights along the riverbank of ?t?karo accompanied by the beautiful and ethereal music by Lyttelton-based artist Motte.

properties.Title: Te Poi me Te Tapu o te Mārama (Move to your own beat)
properties.Description: Move to your own beat.

properties.Title: Te Poi me Te Tapu o te Mārama (Move to your own beat)
properties.Description: Move to your own beat.

properties.Title: Te Poi me Te Tapu o te Mārama (Move to your own beat)
properties.Description: Move to your own beat.

properties.Title: Te Poi me Te Tapu o te Mārama (Move to your own beat)
properties.Description: Move to your own beat.

properties.Title: Te Poi me Te Tapu o te Mārama (Move to your own beat)
properties.Description: Move to your own beat.

properties.Title: Tirama Mai
properties.Description: Thanks to the team at Lightsite this is the spot to take that perfect photo in front of our bold and beautiful T?rama Mai sign. Gather your wh?naunga and take a photo to remember what you did this Matariki.

properties.Title: Nga Whetu, Nga Manu (The Stars Are Like Birds) Stars
properties.ArtistCompany: ILLUMINATI - Abe Fisher and Ariki Creative - Taane Flannagan
properties.Description: Matariki stars from tree.

properties.Title: Taiwhaka Kai (Food court area)
properties.Description:
Kerry Ford of Foodies has pulled together an amazing selection of kai to tantalise your tastebuds. 
Mid-winter was a time of rest and relaxation for M?ori. The food storage pits and houses were full, and the busy harvest season was over. Food and feasting was a central element in Matariki, and people came together to share the fruits of the harvest. Other forms of celebration included music, dance, art and spending time with one another. Gather your whanau together, eat some tasty kai and have a celebration together.

properties.Title: Mana Wahine
properties.Description: Referencing the eight generations of w?hine in Harrington�s wh?nau to her namesake, Ema Turumeke, KAKANA (Team Player) is a sculpture of grand, bright and luminous forms, huddled together as if bodies sharing secrets, knowledge or sacred information.

properties.Title: He Hahana o Toi Ōtautahi (Toi Ōtautahi Lightboxes)
properties.ArtistCompany:
Conor Clark, Simon Kaan and Kim Lowe.
Powered by Connetics
properties.Description: Lightboxes.
